summary: The diff only updates project_state.json to record pending feature requests; it does not implement the requested Facebook footer link or any UI changes.

missing_requirements.requirement: Add a new Facebook social link in the website footer that points to https://www.facebook.com/profile.php?id=61575271824165 (with new-tab behavior, rel="noopener noreferrer", and accessible labeling, shown wherever the footer renders).
missing_requirements.reason: No frontend/footer component or any site UI code was modified; the only change is a project_state.json entry marking the request as pending.
